content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Mycu: Custom Tabs
content.author: Mycu
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Adds up to nine new tabs to property owned menu allowing to organize player's assets and manage vanilla tabs.
